messages.challenge_err_invalid: Invalid challenge string, playing random game.
messages.dictionary_err: Dictionary not loaded. Please wait a bit.
messages.letters: How many letters in the hidden word
messages.dict_uri_text: What is the meaning of this word?
messages.challenge_link: Challenge a friend to this word
messages.challenge_won: I guessed the word in WORDLE! Can you too?
messages.challenge_lost: I couldn't guess the word in WORDLE. Can you?
messages.challenge_won_t: I guessed the word in Wordle in {time}. Can you?
messages.challenge_lost_t: I couldn't guess this word in Wordle in {time}. Can you?
messages.todays_mode_desc: By default, you play in no-limit mode with random words. Turn on this mode to play the word that is guessed today.
messages.dark_theme_desc: Change colors of the website to dark for better experience
messages.difficulty_hard_hint: Green letters must stay fixed, and yellow letters must be reused
messages.difficulty_ultra_hint: Yellow letters must move away from where they were clued, and gray clues must be obeyed
messages.timer_desc: If the timer bothers you, you can completely remove it from the screen by selecting this option.
messages.n_timer_desc: Turn on to show the timer in the game
messages.gen_desc: Make a game with your own word and share it with friends
messages.gen_hint: Word must be a valid dictionary word from 4 to 11 letters
messages.gen_ran: Or make a game with a random word
messages.gen_let: How many letters will be in the random word
messages.tour_err_param: Invalid tournament string, playing random game.
messages.tour_desc: Create a game of a series of words that will be guessed one by one. Add 1 to 10 words.
messages.tour_share: I played a Wordle tournament and guessed {x} words from {y} in {time}
about_page: You have to guess the hidden word in {maxGuesses} tries and the color of the letters changes to show how close you are.
To start the game, just enter any word, for example:
T , B aren't in the target word at all.
A , L is in the word but in the wrong spot.
E is in the word and in the correct spot.
Another try to find matching letters in the target word.
messages.today_completed1: Today‚Äôs Wordle is completed, come back in {time}
messages.today_completed2: While waiting you can practice in unlimited Wordle
messages.disable_anim_desc: Turn on to reduce game animations

keyboard: q w e r t y u i o p
a s d f g h j k l
Backspace z x c v b n m Enter
